content: It's your computer. With the nets and video games.
No time to play Nest of Birdcraft, you gotta check your work schedule. Boss always posts it last minute.
And as the star employee of Crouton Italiano (and chief billpayer of your own life) you gotta be on time!
Bro, you just woke up. Save those ZZZ's for night time.
Night owls don't make it to the morning shift on time.
